title: Listening to Politics, with Brandon Scott
itunes:title: Listening to Politics, with Brandon Scott
description:
Jessa talks to Brandon Scott, currently the City Council President and hopefully the next mayor of Baltimore, to talk about how the language of politics can become the language of exclusion. We discuss how to treat gun violence as a public health issue, why we should lower the voting age to 16, and how to think about the prison abolition movement in a city like Baltimore. 

http://jessacrispin.com

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual
